page.title: 14 Sports we play and watch.
page.content: Children enjoy watching and playing sports. Swimming is probably the most popular sport that children take part in. Our school goes {swimming} on Thursdays and we have two sessions at the local pool. Every fourth year who leaves our school this year (1985) can swim. You can go for a series of badges, red, green, yellow, white, bronze, silver and gold. Many boys enjoy playing {football}. Our school team plays in green and white hoops. Some girls play in the school netball team. In the summer term we have a {sports day} where mums and dads come to watch us. Everyone is in an event. We have sprints, potato races, sack races, egg and spoon races and skipping races.
